name: @pokt-network/pocket-js-nock-utils
description: PocketJS Nock Utilities for Unit and Integration testing

scripts.build: rm -rf dist & mkdir dist & cti create ./src & npm run lint & tsc
scripts.prepare: rm -rf dist & mkdir dist & cti create ./src & npm run lint & tsc & npm run generateDocs
scripts.prepackage: rm -rf dist & mkdir dist & cti create ./src & npm run lint & tsc
scripts.update: rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install

author: Pocket Network
